title: Is there a senior center in or near East Arcadia, NC.?
text:
Yes. Here's a link to a map and more information:
http://maps.google.com/maps?oe=utf-8&client=firefox-a&ie=UTF8&q=east+arcadia+nc+senior+center&fb=1&gl=us&hq=senior+center&hnear=East+Arcadia,+NC&hl=en&view=map&cid=4782515014526437671&ved=0CDsQpQY&ei=PqiPTKrlAoGIyATz4vS6BQ&ll=34.382953,-78.329687&spn=0.006251,0.01929&z=16&iwloc=A
